candidates.title: Remove unused deps and upgrade used ones
candidates.body:
- Removes unused dependencies with `cargo udeps`
- Upgrade all dependencies, including breaking `serde_yaml`  and `tokio`
- Adds clean up to tests to delete the repository director

candidates.title: skip init when storage dir contains xvc guid file for xvc storage new local
candidates.body: This PR also makes changes to XvcStorageOperations trait to return a new struct in init, with an older Guid. This allows to reinit with an already existing directory.

candidates.title: xvc init should respect to previous .gitignore file.
add xvc storage new rsync command and related tests
candidates.body:
This PR adds `xvc storage new rsync` command to use remote storages via rsync. 

Closes #111

candidates.title: Add auto commit functionality to stores and ec after operations, fix initial gitignore
candidates.body:
This PR adds two options to `config` and moves `core.use_git` to `git.use_git`. 

- `git.auto_commit`: Commits Xvc related files after the operations if `true` (default: true)
- `git.auto_stage`: Stages Xvc related files after the operations if `true` (default: false)
